amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to promulgate a proposed policy change by the Department of Labor's Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs that would treat healthcare providers as Federal contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to promulgate Directive 293, issued December 16, 2010, by the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Walberg.
